mapper.select: select HDR_ID, HDR_SUBMITTED_DATE, HDR_START_DATE, HDR_END_DATE, HDR_CONTENT, HDR_STATUS, HDR_COMPLETED_DATE, HD_CATEGORY, HDR_EMP_ID, HDR_APPROVER, HDR_USED_DAY from holiday_request where HDR_EMP_ID = #{empId}

select count(h.hdr_id) from holiday_request h join employees e on h.hdr_emp_id = e.emp_id where e.dept_id = #{deptId} and h.hdr_start_date BETWEEN SYSDATE - 15 AND ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 1) and hdr_status='승인'

select HDR_ID, HDR_SUBMITTED_DATE, HDR_START_DATE, HDR_END_DATE, HDR_CONTENT, HDR_STATUS, HDR_COMPLETED_DATE, HD_CATEGORY, HDR_EMP_ID, HDR_APPROVER, HDR_USED_DAY from holiday_request join employees on hdr_emp_id = emp_id where dept_id = #{deptId} and hdr_start_date BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'yyyy/MM/DD'), -1) AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'yyyy/MM/DD'), 1) and hdr_status='승인'
